content: summer net shawl used malabrigio arroyo in 886 diana 335 yards approx 100 grams needle size 5 5 co3 using knit cast on method r1 k3 r2 s1 k kfb 4 r3 kfb k k2tog r4 s1 k k kfb 5 r5 kfb k k k2tog r6 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb 6 r7 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r8 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb 7 r9 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r10 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb 8 r11 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r12 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb 9 r13 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r14 s1 knit to last stitch kfb 10 r15 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog pattern repeat row r16 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb r17 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r18 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb r19 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r20 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb r21 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r22 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb r23 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r24 s1 knit to last stitch kfb r25 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r26 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb r27 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r28 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb r29 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r30 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last stitch kfb r31 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r32 s1 k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 stitches k kfb r33 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog r34 s1 knit to last stitch kfb r35 kfb knit across to last 2 then k2tog repeat row 16 through 35 until desired length note you should always have 4 hole row then one garter ridge row bind off with needle one size larger
